content: Aragon is an open-source project that aims to enable decentralized management of organizations, using the Ethereum blockchain. Aragon provides tools and infrastructure for creating and managing decentralized autonomous organizations (DAOs) that operate on the Ethereum blockchain. These tools include a decentralized court system for resolving disputes, a voting system for making decisions, and a treasury management system for handling funds. Aragon also provides a platform for creating and managing token-based economies within organizations, as well as for creating and managing decentralized apps (dApps) that can be integrated into the organization's ecosystem.
